text: My everyday job is about superficial beauty, but when I'm not working I prefer to work on my inner beauty - I read a lot, I try to learn.
author: Bar Refaeli

text: Beauty, of course, is the most important requirement and the paramount asset of the applicant.
author: Florenz Ziegfeld

text: In all my career, in my ups and downs, I've never had a beauty campaign. This was meaningful that at almost 41 years old, I could be getting my first beauty campaign. It made me feel really great.
author: Teri Hatcher

text: I'm 40 and I just got my first beauty campaign with Clairol Nice and Easy.
author: Teri Hatcher

text: This was meaningful that at almost 41 years old, I could be getting my first beauty campaign.
author: Teri Hatcher
